function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of real-life data or full business cases to evaluate the quantitative impacts of the coronavirus pandemic","Impact":"Inability to accurately measure the impact of the pandemic on the construction industry","Mitigation":"Develop models and simulations based on available data to estimate the impact","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling software","People":"Researchers, analysts, and industry professionals","Owner":"Research institutions and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of projector company-specific data due to limited data tracking during the pandemic","Impact":"Inability to assess the specific impacts on projector companies","Mitigation":"Encourage data tracking and reporting within the projector industry","Technologies":"Data collection and reporting tools","People":"Projector companies, industry associations","Owner":"Regulatory bodies and industry associations"},{"Description":"Construction site suspensions and slow progress hindering data collection","Impact":"Lack of essential data for evaluating the pandemic's impact on construction activities","Mitigation":"Implement remote data collection methods and technology for monitoring construction sites","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology, drones, IoT sensors","People":"Construction site managers, data analysts","Owner":"Construction companies, technology firms"},{"Description":"Lack of guidelines for handling unprecedented events in the construction industry","Impact":"Difficulty in effectively managing and responding to crises like the pandemic","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive guidelines and protocols for crisis management and contingency planning","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, crisis management software","People":"Industry regulators, crisis management specialists","Owner":"Industry associations, regulatory bodies"}]}
